titles: An abstract (with remarks) of Dr. Scot's sermon preached at Chelmsford assizes, Aug. 31, 1685 wherein the doctor prophetically gives his opinion of the consequences of the late revolution, concluding with an excellent character of King James the Second.
author: Scott, John, 1639-1695.
Philalethes.
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
keywords: Scott, John, 1639-1695. --  Sermon preached at the assizes at Chelmsford ... August 31, 1685.
